fields.Title: VILLAGE / LITTLE LILY
fields.Description: One of Netpicker's kids not running around in the village, instead she sits on the sofa. You can exchange a few words with her.

fields.Title: Jump to: [Little Lily: ""Yes!" She lights with recognition...."]
Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'll keep an eye on him." The lieu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'll keep an eye on him." The lieutenant cuts in faster than you can reply. "Don't worry."

fields.Title: Little Lily: ""Good." She hugs Lamby close to her..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good." She hugs Lamby close to her again.

fields.Title: Little Lily: ""Uh huh," she nods. "Mom is great!..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Uh huh," she nods. "Mom is great! You know what's great about my mom?"

fields.Title: Suggestion: "You might be able to get on Garte's..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You might be able to get on Garte's good side if you replace the broken skua you almost certainly broke?

fields.Title: You: ""Rebel?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Rebel?"

fields.Title: You: ""And where are the gloves now?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "And where are the gloves now?"

fields.Title: Empathy: "She doesn't want you to think she s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She doesn't want you to think she stole them.

fields.Title: You: ""I need those gloves.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I need those gloves."

fields.Title: You: ""Do you know anyone named Ruby?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Do you know anyone named Ruby?"

fields.Title: Half Light: "FUCK OFF."
fields.Dialogue Text: FUCK OFF.

fields.Title: You: ""No can do. I got a potty mouth til..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No can do. I got a potty mouth till I die."

fields.Title: You: "I won't swear! I just won't! I'll j..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I won't swear! I just won't! I'll just go quiet, you watch!

fields.Title: Little Lily: ""Bye!" The girl's large, curious ey..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Bye!" The girl's large, curious eyes remain fixed on you.

fields.Title: You: ""What's that?" (Point at the stuffe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What's that?" (Point at the stuffed bird hanging from the ceiling.)

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: CheckItem("ruffed_grouse_taxidermy") == false  and  Variable["TASK.take_bird_to_garte"] == false  and  Variable["TASK.take_bird_to_garte_done"] == false  and  Variable["village.lily_talked_about_bird"] == false

fields.Title: You: ""Everything?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Everything?"

fields.Title: Little Lily: ""Isn't he soft?" She's right, Lamby..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Isn't he soft?" She's right, Lamby is very soft. She rubs the white fur against your cheek, then returns the lamb into her lap, cuddling it.

fields.Title: You: ""Wait, you mean spooky, right?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wait, you mean spooky, right?"

fields.Title: Little Lily: ""Oooh..." She doesn't seem to under..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oooh..." She doesn't seem to understand, but you have conveyed the 'important' part, at least.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant sighs, and kneels to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant sighs, and kneels to be eye-level with the girl. "Maybe someone you know has acted a little different, lately?"

fields.Title: Little Lily: ""Yes!" She lights with recognition...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes!" She lights with recognition. "The twins got in trouble for saying *bad words*."

fields.Title: Volition: "Guess you held your ground. It can..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Guess you held your ground. It can be good, being honest with yourself.

fields.Title: You: ""Not really, but I'd like to.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Not really, but I'd like to."

fields.Title: You: ""Revolutionary?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Revolutionary?"

fields.Title: You: ""Why is it 'booky'?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why is it 'booky'?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Press your damn cheek against Lamb..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Press your damn cheek against Lamby, okay?" The lieutenant sounds authoritative -- and surprisingly gruff.

fields.Title: Little Lily: ""Yesss." She frowns. "They don't wa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yesss." She frowns. "They don't want to play with me. They're older and play outside!"

fields.Title: Little Lily: ""That's nice! My mom is great," she..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's nice! My mom is great," she nods. "She's never angry or anything."

fields.Title: Little Lily: ""*Everything*!" She shouts with gle..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Everything*!" She shouts with glee.

fields.Title: You: ""I guess they do look alike.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I guess they do look alike."

fields.Title: You: ""Anything. Maybe something you saw..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Anything. Maybe something you saw or heard that was weird?"

fields.Title: Little Lily: ""What?" She covers Lamby's ears by..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What?" She covers Lamby's ears by cupping his whole head in her small palms.

fields.Title: Little Lily: "She stares at you, waiting for an a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She stares at you, waiting for an answer.

fields.Title: Volition: "Was it good to lie to a child? Mayb..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Was it good to lie to a child? Maybe it doesn't matter. It's not your responsibility.

fields.Title: You: ""Well, can I have it?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well, can I have it?"

fields.Title: Little Lily: ""Vee-eery booky!" She's clutching h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Vee-eery booky!" She's clutching her stuffed toy and shaking her head. "Don't go there."

fields.Title: You: ""What's this?" (Show her the stuffe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What's this?" (Show her the stuffed bird you took from the ceiling.)

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: CheckItem("ruffed_grouse_taxidermy") == true  and  Variable["TASK.take_bird_to_garte"] == false  and  Variable["TASK.take_bird_to_garte_done"] == false  and  Variable["village.lily_talked_about_bird"] == false

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "Wasn't Garte, the cafeteria manager..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Wasn't Garte, the cafeteria manager, trying to repair a piece of taxidermy?

fields.Title: Little Lily: ""My mom tells me that I'm a big gir..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "My mom tells me that I'm a big girl, but she doesn't know that I can't say *ll*. Or like, sometimes I can, but then... *ll*... *rr*... *llrr*..."

fields.Title: Little Lily: ""Yep!" The girl nods firmly. "I don..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yep!" The girl nods firmly. "I don't say bad words. Lamby doesn't either."

fields.Title: Little Lily: ""Yes." She yawns, and leans back in..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes." She yawns, and leans back into the cushion.

fields.Title: Little Lily: ""Hello, mister!" A young girl, bare..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hello, mister!" A young girl, barely four or five years old, sits on the sofa. She is looking at you with frank curiosity.

fields.Title: Little Lily: ""Noo, mister!" Her eyes grow wider..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Noo, mister!" Her eyes grow wider as she shakes her head. "Even Lamby doesn't like it." She hugs her stuffed toy tighter.

fields.Title: Little Lily: ""Yesssss, I am! Little Lily!" She g..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yesssss, I am! Little Lily!" She gazes at you with her big eyes. "You know my mom?"

fields.Title: You: ""There was a phasmid in it! I was t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There was a phasmid in it! I was trying to catch it."

fields.Title: You: ""Are the twins outside your brother..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Are the twins outside your brothers?"

fields.Title: Little Lily: ""I dunno.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I dunno."

fields.Title: Little Lily: ""It's old and broken." She nods. "D..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's old and broken." She nods. "Dan-ze-ruus, Mom says. I listen to mom. Lamby also listens. Brothers listen. They tried going there, but it was scary and they ran away!"

fields.Title: You: ""I don't deserve it. I'm scum.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't deserve it. I'm scum."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Where did you get these gloves?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Where did you get these gloves?"

fields.Title: You: ""Where are your parents?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Where are your parents?"

fields.Title: Little Lily: "It has only lasted three seconds. T..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It has only lasted three seconds. The girl still waits for her answer.

fields.Title: You: ""I heard you kids might have gotten..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I heard you kids might have gotten into the Feld building?"

fields.Title: Little Lily: ""It's Lamby! He's my friend. Sort o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's Lamby! He's my friend. Sort of, like..." She holds the fuzzy beast up to demonstrate.

fields.Title: Little Lily: ""Lamby usually doesn't like strange..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Lamby usually doesn't like strangers, but you're also fuzzy like Lamby."

fields.Title: Little Lily: ""Oooh..." She doesn't seem to under..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oooh..." She doesn't seem to understand, but the lieutenant's tone has conveyed to her the 'important' part.

fields.Title: Little Lily: ""Sure! I mean you already took it...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sure! I mean you already took it. I don't like it anyway... it looks angry."

fields.Title: Little Lily: ""Lamby doesn't like bad words. Plea..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Lamby doesn't like bad words. Please promise!"

fields.Title: You: ""What's that thing you're holding?"..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What's that thing you're holding?" (Point at her toy.)

fields.Title: You: ""Lamby looks like he's falling apar..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Lamby looks like he's falling apart."

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "All right. You just need to grab it..."
fields.Dialogue Text: All right. You just need to grab it from the ceiling and go!

fields.Title: You: ""I heard there was a girl here who..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I heard there was a girl here who has armoured gloves. Is that you?"

fields.Title: Little Lily: ""Found them when Lamby and I were p..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Found them when Lamby and I were playing hide-and-seek. In an empty house where no one lives! I think someone hid them there..."

fields.Title: Little Lily: "She pouts. "I hid them. The twins w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She pouts. "I hid them. The twins were going to take them. They're stupid..." She lifts her stuffed toy up and looks into its one remaining eye, as though searching for confirmation.

fields.Title: Little Lily: ""They're in my sandcastle." She poi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "They're in my sandcastle." She points somewhere outside. "Behind our house. Under the sand. You can break the castle, it's not very good."

fields.Title: You: ""Poor Girl Child Revolution. What h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Poor Girl Child Revolution. What have the bourgeois done to you?"

fields.Title: Little Lily: "She gasps. "No! Don't say bad words..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She gasps. "No! Don't say bad words! Promise?"

fields.Title: You: ""Okay." (Lie.)"
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay." (Lie.)

fields.Title: Volition: "Yes. There you are."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes. There you are.
fields.Alternate1: Yes. There you are. It's okay -- you can breathe now. That wasn't so bad, see? It's just who you are.

fields.Title: Little Lily: ""Uh, mister, what were you doing in..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Uh, mister, what were you doing in my fireplace?"

fields.Title: Little Lily: ""Hello, mister!" The Net Picker's d..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hello, mister!" The Net Picker's daughter waves at you.

fields.Title: Little Lily: ""Haa haa, yessss!" She smiles, hugg..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Haa haa, yessss!" She smiles, hugging her fuzzy toy.

fields.Title: Little Lily: ""They look... ai-dent-ik!" She slow..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "They look... ai-dent-ik!" She slowly processes the word, then snickers with laughter.

fields.Title: Little Lily: ""Sure! Just go and get it. I don't..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sure! Just go and get it. I don't like it anyway... it looks angry."

fields.Title: Little Lily: ""Sure! Just go and get it. I don't..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sure! Just go and get it. I don't like it anyway... it looks angry."

fields.Title: You: ""Are you Lilienne's daughter?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Are you Lilienne's daughter?"

fields.Title: Little Lily: ""Ohh, okay!" She nods seriously."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ohh, okay!" She nods seriously.

fields.Title: You: ""Can I have it? I know someone who..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Can I have it? I know someone who really likes stuffed birds."

fields.Title: You: "Press your cheek against Lamby."
fields.Dialogue Text: Press your cheek against Lamby.

fields.Title: You: ""Where did you get them?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Where did you get them?"

fields.Title: You: ""Anything that will help me dismant..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Anything that will help me dismantle Capitalism, so that you can inherit Communism, O' Girl Child Revolution?"

fields.Title: Little Lily: ""Noo-noooo, that's not it." She fro..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Noo-noooo, that's not it." She frowns, looking at her tattered toy. "You know what you are, Lamby."

fields.Title: Little Lily: ""Okay, then. I'm sorry." She presse..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay, then. I'm sorry." She presses her own cheek against Lamby and smiles, sadly.

fields.Title: Little Lily: "Lamby remains silent. The fireplace..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Lamby remains silent. The fireplace flickers and cackles. She hugs the doll close to her chest and laughs.

fields.Title: You: "But what if I don't want to be a ma..."
fields.Dialogue Text: But what if I don't want to be a man who swears? What if I want to be a No-Bad-Word Cop?

fields.Title: Little Lily: ""Cap-capi-capeel..." She struggles..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Cap-capi-capeel..." She struggles to pronounce the words. She shakes her head. "No."

fields.Title: You: ""Is that it?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Is that it?"

fields.Title: You: ""But bad words can be good! It can..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "But bad words can be good! It can be healthy to express yourself with them."

fields.Title: Volition: "You can't abandon swearing for a si..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You can't abandon swearing for a simple reason: You're just a man who swears.

fields.Title: You: ""Revisionist?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Revisionist?"

fields.Title: You: ""Nothing.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Nothing."

fields.Title: You: ""It's grown-up business. You wouldn..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's grown-up business. You wouldn't understand. Just tell me where they are."

fields.Title: Little Lily: ""Sure! I mean you already took it...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sure! I mean you already took it. I don't like it anyway... it looks angry."

fields.Title: Little Lily: "She turns the stuffed lamb to face..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She turns the stuffed lamb to face her. "What does that mean, Lamby?" The doll offers no reply. Stuffing hangs out its rear.

fields.Title: You: ""Good-bye." [Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good-bye." [Leave.]

fields.Title: Little Lily: ""It's a *grouse*," she yelps, smili..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's a *grouse*," she yelps, smiling broadly.

fields.Title: Little Lily: ""Yessss," she yelps happily! "Lamby..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yessss," she yelps happily! "Lamby was a re-luz-ion...ry."

fields.Title: Little Lily: ""We don't go there. Mom and auntie..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We don't go there. Mom and auntie think we do, but it's very booky."

fields.Title: Little Lily: ""Uhhhhh..." She sits her doll on he..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Uhhhhh..." She sits her doll on her lap. Its ragged limbs reach out toward you, as if longing for a cuddle. "Like what?"

fields.Title: You: ""Bad words are for losers. Good on..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Bad words are for losers. Good on you for not saying them."

fields.Title: You: "Hey, why can't I swear off swearing..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Hey, why can't I swear off swearing for real?

fields.Title: Little Lily: "She clutches a small stuffed animal..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She clutches a small stuffed animal. Occasionally she twirls it around.

fields.Title: Little Lily: "She twirls the furry doll around in..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She twirls the furry doll around in the air, giggling happily.

fields.Title: Little Lily: ""Ohh, okay!" She twirls her fuzzy b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ohh, okay!" She twirls her fuzzy beast in the air.

fields.Title: Little Lily: ""Yes. Very soft." Suddenly she push..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. Very soft." Suddenly she pushes the stuffed animal toward your face.

fields.Title: Little Lily: ""Mhmh," she replies, nodding. "It's..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Mhmh," she replies, nodding. "It's very, very booky."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Kids." The lieutenant shakes his h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Kids." The lieutenant shakes his head.

fields.Title: You: ""I see. Thank you for the tip; I'll..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I see. Thank you for the tip; I'll talk to them about it." (Move on.)
fields.Alternate1: "Anyway... I'll talk to your brothers about bad words. Thanks for the tip!" (Move on.)

fields.Title: You: "... Fuck. I guess I am a man who sw..."
fields.Dialogue Text: ... Fuck. I guess I am a man who swears.

fields.Title: Volition: "Because it's just not you. I'm sorr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Because it's just not you. I'm sorry.

fields.Title: You: ""I'm talking to the children to lea..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm talking to the children to learn from them. Has anything strange happened here lately?"

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["TASK.find_children_of_the_big_sea"] == true  and  Variable["village.lily_bad_word_brothers_known"] == false  and  Variable["village.twins_spoke_to_boys_about_swearing_done"] == false  and  Variable["TASK.find_children_of_the_big_sea_cancelled"] == false

fields.Title: You: ""Revacholian?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Revacholian?"

fields.Title: You: ""Remote Viewer?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Remote Viewer?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I think she means 'revolutionary'.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I think she means 'revolutionary'."

fields.Title: You: ""Lamby looks soft.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Lamby looks soft."

fields.Title: You: ""I need them for a very important p..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I need them for a very important police investigation."

fields.Title: Little Lily: ""You're welcome!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're welcome!"

fields.Title: You: ""What's wrong with bad words? I lov..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What's wrong with bad words? I love bad words."

fields.Title: You: "What? No clever answers from the bo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What? No clever answers from the body and brain? Nothing?

fields.Title: Little Lily: "The little girl tilts her head. "Do..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The little girl tilts her head. "Do you promise you won't say bad words anymore?"

fields.Title: You: ""Yes, we met earlier.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, we met earlier."

fields.Title: You: ""Is there anything you can tell me..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Is there anything you can tell me about the building?"

fields.Title: Suggestion: "You might be able to get on Garte's..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You might be able to get on Garte's good side if you make up for the skua you broke?

fields.Title: You: ""Revanchist?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Revanchist?"

fields.Title: You: ""Never mind. Have you just seen or..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Never mind. Have you just seen or heard anything weird lately?"

fields.Title: You: ""No, do tell me.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, do tell me."

fields.Title: Little Lily: ""They look the same! Haa ha haa! So..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "They look the same! Haa ha haa! Sometimes I can't tell them 'part."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We're going to need those gloves...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We're going to need those gloves. It's for important police business." He enunciates the last two words carefully.

fields.Title: Little Lily: ""Why?" She looks at you suspiciousl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why?" She looks at you suspiciously.

fields.Title: Little Lily: "She frowns, delaying divulging her..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She frowns, delaying divulging her secret. "Oo-kay," she says finally with some reluctance. "I hid them inside my sandcastle. Behind the house." She points somewhere outside. "You can take them."

fields.Title: Little Lily: ""My mom's outside, and I don't real..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "My mom's outside, and I don't really know about my dad." She gives you a bright smile like it's a good thing.

fields.Title: Little Lily: ""Nooooo! Don't be bad too!" Her fac..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Nooooo! Don't be bad too!" Her face bunches up in a scowl.

fields.Title: Volition: "Please, don't make this more diffic..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Please, don't make this more difficult for yourself. It's okay to swear. It can be healthy, even.

fields.Title: Little Lily: "Lamby is a stuffed lamb that, admit..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Lamby is a stuffed lamb that, admittedly, has seen better days. One of the eye-buttons is missing and the fur is tattered in several parts.

fields.Title: You: ""Oh, okay. Well, pleased to meet yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh, okay. Well, pleased to meet you, Lamby."

fields.Title: Little Lily: ""Yessss, Lamby has lived a long lif..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yessss, Lamby has lived a long life." She waves the lamb around in the air. "Lamby was a... re.. a rev..." She stumbles on her words.

fields.Title: You: ""They look identical, right? I said..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "They look identical, right? I said the same thing."

fields.Title: Little Lily: ""Haa ha haa!" She continues laughin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Haa ha haa!" She continues laughing. "Lamby tells them part." She waves her fuzzy doll in the air.

fields.Title: Little Lily: ""Ooooh." She looks alarmed. "I had..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ooooh." She looks alarmed. "I had gloves, very big ones! Heavy too."

fields.Title: Little Lily: ""Ll... Luby... Rr... R-luuby." Sudd..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ll... Luby... Rr... R-luuby." Suddenly the girl gets all serious and leans in, as if she's about to tell you a secret.

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "He's not going to let you make a fo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's not going to let you make a fool of yourself or the RCM in front of this girl. Not while he's here.

fields.Title: You: ""Yes, but what's it *for*?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, but what's it *for*?"

fields.Title: You: ""Uh, okay, thanks.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Uh, okay, thanks."
